caption.title: Climate change projections under RCP8.5.
caption.p: Changes projected in the mean values of ( a) RSDS, ( b) PVpot, ( c) TAS and ( e) VWS under the RCP8.5 to the end of this century (2070–2099 versus 1970–1999) obtained from the E mean, E max and E min over land. E max and E min values are coloured only if they are significant ( p<0.05) within their corresponding ensemble member, otherwise they are depicted in white. E mean values are coloured only if they are robust, in white if they are negligible and in grey if they are uncertain. ( d, f) The E mean, E max and E min changes in PVpot that would be induced by the changes in either TAS alone or VWS alone. See the Methods section for details.
